formatted_address: 107 Bukit Purmei Road, #01-K1, Bukit Purmei, Singapore 090107
name: JC Provision Shop Pte Ltd

reviews.text:
Never seen it open. If the owner don't even bother open, why is this shop even here?? The vending machines near the shop is bad. It barely has any snacks, Hershey's bar is $3.50, red bull is $99.99, and when you buy something, it will just drop it down violently. Once opened can of coke, explodes. Ribena cap damn hard to open. I literally had to use my teeth to open.
Don't come here unless you want a unpleasant experience. Oh yeah, they took down one of the vending machines.

I pass by This Shop Very Angry at this shop Never Open if not Interested to open Shop Then don't work and Don't open shop for everyday Is been so long that this shop Never Open People Shopee Parcel are inside Very Disappointed of this Shop and shop owner

Useless shopee collection point. Always closed! Why u became collection point. Holding people's parcels for no reason?! U think ppl got alot of time coming back and forth multiple times to check whether you opened! Useless!

I have read the reviews and I totally agree. This collection point is absolutely useless. I have been there on 1/4 and 2/4 and it was closed. My collection due date is 4/4. Going to try one more time on 3/4 at lunchtime. Not sure if I will get my parcel.
please don't put this location for shopee collection. doesnt open during the stipulated timing. called the shop based on the number here but the person said wrong no.

vicinity: 107 Bukit Purmei Road, #01-K1, Bukit Purmei, Singapore
